column5: Just wondering where I can take my boat out this week. Is wiarton ice free? Simcoe? Owen sound? Thanks
Not here!!! LOL Maybe next month, late next month.
im going to work at plummers this year on great bear, how is it that the ice in yk goes out mid-late may and on great bear the ice goies out 5-15th july? how many kms north of you are they?

It goes out on the smaller lakes around town about the May 24 weekend and on Great Slave it goes out in mid to late june. Up at Plummers the ice went out in early June last year, but it generally goes out the last week of June first week of July. I have seen it go out as late as the third week of July.  FYI, Great Bear is 400 miles North of Yellowknife.
wow sounds like i may be fishing between ice floes mid-july   cant wait!!!
Noticed the rain last night = Penetang Harbour is ice free. Not sure if the outer basin is though ...
The last of the ice blew out of my bay on Buckhorn yesterday. I think we're pretty much ice free throughout the Kawarthas now.
We have cancelled all of our ice alerts here too.   Art

Not quite Jer...was down by Taites Bay this afternoon and still lots of ice but it is  deteriorating quickly...our lagoon is ice free except at the mouth...this weekend the bay might be ice-free...lost the pics I took...will try again tomorrow...
Simcoe is ice free from Kemp as far as I can see east towards BBP....  Was down there tonight for a walk.
There can be the odd ice berg around too.

It's going out fast. 3 days ago; hardly any open water. Yesterday (it's still dark) several lakes had opened up completly and the remaining ice is very dark. I was out on Horseshoe yesterday, and it's mostly ice free. Mountain still has lots, but it is very dark.
Kempenfelt is definitely ice free as Bill said.  Was chowing on some DQ next to it last night.  Seeing that made me all tingly inside (Either that or it was the DQ).

Check out the modis sattelite shot...  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/modis.cgi/modis?region=o&page=1&template=sub&image=a1.11102.1852.LakeOntario.143.250m.jpg  Looks like most of the kawarthas are good to go ice wise.
Thanks Cliff. Yeah, Canal looks completely ice free. Made in reference to a question earlier.
Awesome, looks like I can run from Keswick almost to my favourite area, maybe it'll be free by the weekend.... I coming for you Mumbo Jumbos...
